statements: DELETE FROM in_game_events WHERE event_type = 'Achievement' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Progress WHERE player_id = 1 AND quest_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Progress WHERE player_id = 1 AND quest_id = 10 AND progress_status = 'abandoned';
DELETE FROM quests WHERE quest_name = 'Retrieve the Lost Sword';
DELETE FROM quests WHERE quest_difficulty > 3 AND quest_reward = 'Epic Loot';
DELETE FROM EventRegistrations WHERE player_id = 123 AND event_id = 456;
DELETE FROM EventRegistrations WHERE event_id = 1 AND player_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Quests WHERE quest_difficulty = 'Hard' AND quest_start_date < '2022-01-01';
